A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I never thought the day would come when a film would knock The Empire Strikes Back off the number 1 spot in my all time favourite films\, but The Last Jedi did that for me. Rian Johnson is one of my favourite directors\, so I was excited when he was announced as Director and was blown away by the film. If you haven't seen Brick\, you need to watch it immediately. \n\nCan't wait to see his new trilogy of films!
